hero_title: I love learning and building Web stuff
hero_subtitle: Hi I'm Mel Jones, how's it going? I'm an Australian-born Frontend Developer based in Berlin and I care about Humans and our planet and the powerful tool potential that Web has.
hero_subtitle2: I got inspired by the history of coders, engineers, entrepreneurs, and visionaries who helped create and shape the modern Web. So I got involved in the community and taught myself to code.
hero_subtitle3: Software is for Humans. Welcome to my portfolio site and my little slice of the Web..
